name: KICK THE BALDI!
description:
Are you bored with so much stress? NO IN APP SHOPPING!
Have you encountered many problems in your life and are you struggling to find the right place for anger?
I think Kick the Baldi is a good choice, there is no time limit, infinite firepower and bullets where you can completely release the pressure.
Forget your problems and get rid of the game!
Collect free coins, more weapons, and tools to choose from.
Would you like to experience the feeling of stress relieving?
